Next to IKEA large room quiet for sleeping
location is convenient and room is cleanI was waiting for checking in for more than 10 minutes and three front desk persons are NOT busy at all
Room service that brought us dinner was fast and eficient and the shuttle guy was very nice
The room was comfortable and nice decorated
Very clean and spacious rooms with an indoor pool excercise rooms and many more great amenities
Additionally when I had specific requests for my room they were all honored and I would highly recommend this hotel
Staff is very helpful and they clean the rooms well
The conference rooms are spacious and provided a great atmosphere for the event we attended
Nice place nothing special about the decor spacious room 206 for one night after taxes and fees
1: The faucets leaked for 3 days house keeping was inefficient and cable movies were not available during our stay even though the front desk was informed

Issue 2 Walking into a room that was already assigned to somebody else
We did not eat at the dining room because of the prices or drink at the bar but we did try the cafe
No way should this room be a double far too small

The toilet was broken and the tub drain was clogged
